website_summaries.verdict: Between its easily identifiable images, cheery themes, and durable construction, this sizable book is easily the best way to introduce young kids to coloring.
pros: Nearly 200 pages of artwork reminiscent of a children’s picture book
Chunky black outlines help to promote coloring within them
Huge variety of subjects, ranging from zoo animals to sailboats
cons: Its illustrations are printed on both sides of each page

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: As an adult who enjoys simple coloring and "happy" pictures when stressed I purchased this book for myself. I am very pleased with this product. There are OVER 150 designs in this book. The pages are double-sided; however the pages are good quality bright-white paper. I have been able to color pictures in this book using Crayola markers and there is NO bleed through. I can't even remotely tell what marker colors I used on the other side of a page. I most definitely will be purchasing other books from this publisher!
customer_reviews.author: rachelbTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional First Coloring Book!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son is in love with all things arts and crafts, especially simple coloring. This coloring book is absolutely fantastic! The illustrations are simple and large. The outlining is done in thick black lines, and the pages are thick. After cracking the spine, the book can easily be spread to color each side. We've found the binding holding the pages together to be a great quality. So great that the pages don't tear out well. Doing so seems to warp the entire binding. This isn't a problem for our family as we like the idea of keeping all the pages together. Exceptional first coloring book. Completely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves This Coloring Book
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage daughter who is developmentally disabled. She has loved this coloring book. We bought this in September last year, and she just about has all of the pictures colored now. So it has lasted her almost a year. She went from making a couple of marks on the paper to really covering the page with colors. She still isn't coloring inside the lines, but she is enjoying the process of putting lots of color on the paper. I am getting ready to buy another coloring book in this series to occupy her once this one is full.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom Who Knows

customer_reviews.title: I love the variety of pictures
customer_reviews.text: It is so difficult to find coloring books that don't have either princesses OR cars/angry superheroes (and nothing else). This one has boys, girls, vehicles, ballerinas, balls, animals, musical instruments. I love the variety of pictures. And the pictures are not too simple but not too detailed. Just right. Perfect. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: High quality simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this coloring book for my four year old son. It replaced the previous coloring book we had purchased which turned out to be too complicated for him to enjoy. I was concerned that this book might be too simple for him because this is certainly not his first coloring book, but the book is perfect. He likes all the pictures, and the paper is much higher quality than any other book we've had -- it's bright white, smooth, and thick. I will be purchasing more from Little Bee Books!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally for an Easter basket for my one-year-old daughter. I put it in there with a few sets of Crayons and this is the first time she’s ever colored. Although she doesn’t stay within the lines yet the thick lines will make it easier for her once she is able to. It comes with a lot of different kinds of pictures so she loves paging through it to find which one she likes and wants to color. Each page is pretty thick so it’s not easy for her to easily rip through when coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 2 year old twins!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several coloring books for our twin boys, but this book was by far the best. The pictures are big and the subjects are easily identifiable by the kids. There are several pages in this book and the pages are thick enough to allow for rough use guaranteeing hours of fun. I highly recommend this book. Dec 31, 2017 It's been a year since we bought this book. Our boys are now 3 years old and they are still working on the seemingly inexhaustible pages. They have learnt and developed new motor skills along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Monk Wants

customer_reviews.title: Thick black lines and bold large pictures
customer_reviews.text: Love this book! Wasn’t sure what exactly to expect, but the pictures are big and bold. Each one has thick black lines that my three year old is able to use to learn to stay inside and color all of the white part. She colored the first picture and was able to stay inside the black lines by coloring smaller sections at once ((ie: the decorative diamond shapes on the side)). She is a huge fan of this book; we use it with her thicker washable markers. I like that, unlike other coloring books, the pictures have large areas to color rather than tiny details that are hard for a toddler to get to.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 1/2 year old daughter and she loves it. The pictures are perfect size for her and she is getting better at coloring. My husband and I will sit with her and color too, since it’s such a simple picture it’s kind of soothing. I would definitely buy it again. The only con is that the pages don’t rip off (I like to give her one page at a time so she doesn’t color one thing on every page in the book ) but I just cut it with scissors so it’s not a big deal. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: The Bookers

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a coloring book with white sturdy pages!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t like coloring in coloring books with light gray or beige pages as you find in majority of coloring books. In addition, those pages are so thin. This on the other hand has white sturdy pages!!!!! I hope they make more varieties because my daughter was so excited. The pictures or illustrations also come in thick bold outlines which make it easy to discern where to stay within the boundaries when coloring. Very happy with this purchase and it’s a great value, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Plumeriagirl

customer_reviews.title: The BEST coloring book for young kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect ‘first coloring book’ for kids!! This book is filled with very simple illustrations to teach a child the very beginning levels of coloring. My 2 year old son loves this book so much and honestly, I’ve never seen anything else like it before. Usually, coloring books (even the ones for kids) have more intricate illustrations and games and puzzles inside But this one is not like that. It is simple objects with nothing else to distract from the image being colored. It’s amazing and my favorite coloring book to give to young kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Give me some perforations!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are great for my two year old and for the price you get a lot of pages but I really wish the pages were perforated so we aren’t always ripping up the pages.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect easy coloring book
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coloring book for my 2 year old! I love it because the pages are thick so he can use markers and they won't bleed through the paper. The binding is also good so the pages won't fall out easily like with some other coloring books. The pictures are cute and basic so they'll keep an older child's attention but not be overwhelmingly detailed either. I would definitely recommend this coloring book!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for young children learning to color
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 5 year old boys love this coloring book. We have probably 20 coloring books with different themes, but this is easily their favorite. The lines are thick which makes it easier for them to stay in the lines, and the pictures are cute and simple enough for kids who are still new to coloring. It has everything from dolls and animals to space themes and dinosaurs. The one and only thing I don’t like is that the pages are not perforated so you can’t rip them out easily. But that would absolutely not stop me from buying it again! I would definitely recommend to anyone with a young child who is getting interested in coloring!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Baker

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are big. Great quality. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old loves the pictures. The pictures are big so they are easier to color. The book has many pages so there will be lots of coloring fun for my son to do! I highly recommend getting this coloring book. Can’t wait until my niece comes over to color. I’m thinking about getting one for her too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great early coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book for early colorers. Thick lines, simple illustrations, great weight for paper, and doesn’t fall apart under the use of busy little coloring hands. I’m going to look for more by this publisher. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Toddler
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is awesome! Each page has really big pictures of items - astronaut, boat, rainbow, etc - for a toddler to easily identify and color. My 16 month old and I color the pages while we name what we see. It's cute, and there are lots of different things to color.
customer_reviews.author: jenk

customer_reviews.title: Fun simple illustrations!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 18 month old to try coloring on something other than just blank paper. She is young so for now it's just scribbles, but she was so excited to see things she is learning about like "apples", "banana" and "doggie"! The bold lines and wide open shapes are great. I wasn't thrilled about paying $9 for something she will just scribble all over, but it's huge and I think will last awhile. I love that it's not a "brand" and just has everyday things in it. I prefer her to lean about life before she learns about fictional characters. My only wish is that it laid a little flatter when opened.
customer_reviews.author: Glowstrz

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at the start of Coronavirus lockdown and it’s still going! It’s huge the pictures are cute and my toddler loves it. She colors 2 hrs a day in it and it’s still going a month later - just tells you how many pages are in it!! Value for money!!
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first coloring book, thicker lines!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 different coloring books for my 14mo, and decided to use this one first mainly because the lines are so much thicker than all the others. It's a perfect first coloring book! My toddler is obviously too young to understand that she needs to stay in the lines, but she'll pick that up! Here's a masterpiece by her, with the smiley face by me, using the Crayola Washable crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coloring book with bold borders to color inside the lines
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like what the title says. It’s a great coloring book for younger kids or kids who have difficulty with fine motor skills. The images are extra large and the borders of the pictures are large as well so it’s easier for kids to color inside the lines.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kim

customer_reviews.title: The Best coloring book for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: These are The Best coloring books for toddlers. The pictures are simple, typically one item like a traffic cone or a ball. The pages are slightly thicker and hold up to water color painting (not a drenching though) as well as the expected crayons/markers. My 2.5 year old is beginning to color in the lines and the large pictures are perfect for that. We plan to get a couple more for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect First Coloring Book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made coloring book! The pages are large with simple figures to color, and the paper is nice and thick so it doesn't crumple easily under toddler fingers. The extra thick black lines really pop and there are a lot of pages to color, too. Although expensive for a coloring book, this one is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4yr old 2.5yr old and a 1yr old. This is a great coloring book. I love the thick pages. They rip out easy the marker doesn’t show through you can color both sides easily. Best part, the print is large. Big simple pictures for the kids to color. The pictures or easy for learning. Simple objects appropriate for them to learn for their age.
customer_reviews.author: Ty & Kylee

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This was our son's favorite coloring book when he was a toddler. He loved it so much that we bought it for him twice. We gave copies as gifts to several other toddlers and one of their mothers reported that when her daughter filled it up, she ALSO bought another copy. My youngest son is now a pre-schooler but I am back to buy this coloring book for yet another toddler in my life. You should, too!
customer_reviews.author: J. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: High end product
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 6 year old grand daughters love this! I bought this for them and they love using our washable felt tip drawing pens. Unlike other coloring book, the paper is thick and doesn't bleed through; the 3 year old really soaks the color into the paper, too. It is two sided and I tear out the pages so they color on a flat surface; the 6 years old loves to color and draw and even though it is a bit to simple for her, she adds her own artistic flair to it and was busy for 1.5 hrs coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Anrol N

customer_reviews.title: Great for a truck loving boy
customer_reviews.text: Although my son is only 2, he actually likes this coloring book. He would color in it more than the previous one I have purchased because he loves trucks!
customer_reviews.author: ZF

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I used this coloring book for my preschool class. They loved the variety of pictures. The pictures were done well with thick lines. I did not let the children chose, but just ripped out the next page and gave it to the next child. No one complained. The pictures were fun to color. It was a highlight when I brought the book out. I saw an improvement in coloring skills while using this book. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gintex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first coloring book
customer_reviews.text: Love this book! My daughter is 18mo old and this is the perfect first coloring book. The lines are wider to help. Easy pictures. I enjoy coloring the pictures. Great gift for a 1 or 2 year old!
customer_reviews.author: irongirl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended !! Doesn’t bleed through
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pictures loved it!! I uploaded a video the paper quality is really good it doesn’t bleed through. We used tempera paint sticks
customer_reviews.author: Chatjmail

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a non-brand (not Paw Patrol or Disney, etc.) coloring book with big simple pictures with thick outer lines, this is perfect. There is also a second one by the same publisher. It has a yellow color. Nice mix of pictures too and not gender specific either. Also, it is quite thick too. Highly recommended. :)
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Thick lines, high quality paper, perfection for toddlers and preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best coloring books for toddlers/preschoolers! My kids color in them endlessly. Thick lines make it less frustrating for beginning colorers and there is so much variety. The paper is nice thick white paper. Can use markers on it no problem! We loved this one so much we bought others.
customer_reviews.author: Hann

customer_reviews.title: Thick coloring book, there are plenty of pages foe ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick coloring book, there are plenty of pages for the little one to color. Simple pictures. My 20 month old son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Last_Avenger

customer_reviews.title: Good, thick coloring book with lots of images
customer_reviews.text: Very thick book of coloring pages! This is good because there is lots to color, but makes it a little difficult for little hands to keep the pages flat and prevent the book from closing on her. Lots of different images with a variety quite different from other books we own. The pages are pretty thick, with one image on the front and back of each page. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: steel_muffinsTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great book for coloring along with child!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coloring book for my 15 month old child for Christmas. It’s a good book to color along. My 3 year old also enjoys coloring with us. I like how the lines are thick which makes it hard to color outside the lines. In my opinion, this book is better than the “adult coloring books” because a page can actually be colored in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Big pictures
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this coloring book. The pictures are simple and have thick lines so staying in the lines is easier. I like to color in it when I need a self esteem boost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this book, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This book is the perfect size and since it’s so big there’s more to color. So many different pictures to color instead of basically the same things repeating like other color books. The pages aren’t flimsy, and there’s so many pages. I definitely recommend this coloring book. I hope in the future they’ll make a hardcover and many more.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Castellane

customer_reviews.title: Fun Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I had so much fun colouring in this book with my 2.5 year old niece. Nice big pictures with an appropriate amount of details for a toddler. Nice white pages that are very high quality. Works prefectly with these crayons:
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: cute, quality coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best coloring books for kids that I’ve ever purchased. Usually I pick ones up at the drugstore or dollar store and they are all the same: thin bible paper with repetitive images from tv shows. This one is great- no branding, just simple drawings with thick, forgiving lines that kids like with room for creativity. Also, the pages are super thick. We’ve only used crayons here, but pretty certain that the pages would hold up okay to markers. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: birthday girl loves it- highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift... but reported that each page is thick and the images don't bleed through. Each picture is extremely large so for the little ones to color little areas is still manageable. 5 star review from the mom that this is the favorite and best coloring book so far. Highly recommend! Purchased solely from other people's reviews.....and the mr sketch markers go well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! THIS IS SO MUCH BETTER THAN I EVEN EXPECTED IT TO BE! THE PICTURES ON EACH PAGE ARE HUGE AND OUTLINED WITH THICK BLACK LINES. PERFECT FOR MY 18 MONTH OLD WHO IS JUST STARTING TO SCRIBBLE :) THE WEIGHT OF THE PAPER IS GREAT TOO, DOESN'T SEEM LIKE IT WILL TEAR EASILY AND SHOULD HOLD UP NICELY WITH SUPERVISION.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Its a decent coloring book providing hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: The kid enjoys it and he spends on and off time coloring in it. Its a decent coloring book.
customer_reviews.author: Rinaro

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2 year old who had always been using his older sisters coloring books. He was super excited to have one of his own. Its important to me to buy pretty gender neutral gifts, and this one is definitely great! Big images that are simple to color on, especially for kids just learning to color in the lines. It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Very large, not-very-detailed drawings. Great variety of generic, simple, but very cute pictures... flowers, cars, boats, animals, space, people, nature, buildings, scenes, etc. Printed on both sides of a somewhat-thicker paper that typical coloring books. Perfect for crayons, but my 3 yr old likes to rip out pages and paint them with her watercolors.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Kids Like It
customer_reviews.text: The kids colored in it and liked the pictures. Good value for the money and it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

customer_reviews.title: Great color book
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for toddlers and even adults! I like how simple the coloring pages are which makes them fun to color and not overwhelming. The designs are good too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Except for No Perforations
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this! Perfect size pictures for kids beginning to color within lines. Wish the pages were perforated for ease of removal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun coloring book
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo and 5yo love this coloring book! We had to order a second one because we colored all the pages in the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pages, bold lines, great coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book! The pages are standard size, and the pictures to color are perfect for toddlers to scribble in. The lines are bold, and many many fun cute pictures to color! I did notice once you flip through the pages, instead of just one animal or object on the page, there’s a few to color in! It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tn_hb315

customer_reviews.title: First coloring book
customer_reviews.text: Excellent first coloring book for toddlers. It is large with large simple pictures inside. It is also thick. So lots of coloring jobs for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: NSF

customer_reviews.title: Best first coloring books. Bar none.
customer_reviews.text: All the books in this series are amazing. They are perfect paper (sturdy white) with large areas to color. Really helps my children not become discouraged when trying so hard to stay in the lines! Perfect series for first coloring books. Wish I’d found them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Hann

customer_reviews.title: grandkids loved it
customer_reviews.text: pictures are big and easy to color. my granddaughters loved theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great to spend hrs coloring
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids that likes coloring. Its very hard to find wide borders of pictures in the new coloring books and this one is perfect. What I was looking for since my daughter is 4 and still learning to color inside. Even I color with her! Very nice pics!
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Good book for my baby girl
customer_reviews.text: Recently my baby girl start to draw, so I bought this one for her. She loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Z

customer_reviews.title: Big animals
customer_reviews.text: He loves this! My son is 18 months old and the pages are big enough for him to color and still enjoy it. He loves all the selections.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My girls are really enjoying this book. I thought the pictures would be too simplistic, but for my 3 and 5 year old, they really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: simple and fun
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is huge. Lots of very simple pictures to color with thick black lines that make it easy for little ones to color. We also practiced using a glue stick and scissors cutting some of these pictures out and making collages. Good value
customer_reviews.author: PeggyK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and interesting pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my granddaughters who are 3 years old. When it arrived I was very impressed with the size of the book and the thickness of the paper. The coloring pages are not visually cluttered like most coloring books and contain pictures of things that kids in this age range are interested in The thick outlines will be great for helping little artists stay inside the lines. I am looking forward to having many of these pages covering my refrigerator with my granddaughters' art in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Made to Last
customer_reviews.text: These are great coloring books. Thick lines for the littlest ones to practice staying in. Cute simple pages with huge variety of pictures. And so many pages it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity Bendixsen

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Happy  Pictures
customer_reviews.text: FUN pictures to color - got 2 for my 2 & 4-year-old Granddaughters; however, they were coloring with the Sharpie Cosmic Color set and the colors did bleed onto the backs of the pages big time!
customer_reviews.author: TexasVMW

customer_reviews.title: Great first coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect coloring book for a toddler. Big, simple pictures of “first word” type things.
customer_reviews.author: Celine W.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great, huge graphics for coloring! This is perfect for my 3 year old to color and learn how to color inside lines. Lots of "pretty" pictures for her to relate to and get excited about.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nicole

customer_reviews.title: L. O. V. E. !!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!! I didn’t know I could love a coloring book as much as I do, but it’s that good! The pages are white and a little thicker which is great for all coloring especially markers. The pictures are the best - good variety and not gender specific (which is hard to find). They are also simple which allows my 3 yo to color but also be creative with designs. I don’t write reviews often but I was amazed by how great this book is and will be gifting it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and nice pictures for coloring
customer_reviews.text: Loveee this book ! The pages are such good quality and easy to rip out for multiple kids to use. Will recommend to have on hand for a coloring day
customer_reviews.author: Angely g

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner coloring books!
customer_reviews.text: This series of coloring books is the best! The lines are dark and thick and the drawings are relatively simple/uncomplicated. Great for beginners or kids with fine motor delays. We take ours to church every week and are always ripping out pages and handing them to eager children. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for younger children with simple/bold images
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 2 year old and absolutely LOVE this. Images are large and bold -not that he's coloring within the lines or anything...but he is enjoying the simple images to color. Also when they say it's a big book, it is! It is thick with so many pages. *Forgot to add, images are on one side and perforated.
customer_reviews.author: Katie T.

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Kids get bored coloring one item per page. Ex. 1 page is a teddy bear. Next page is a icecream cone.
customer_reviews.author: Ariela s

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Perfect gift for toddlers learning to color. Print is big so helps them stay in the lines if that what you're starting to work on. Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Such a great beginners coloring book
customer_reviews.text: Such a great beginners coloring book. Big simple images to color. I feel like this book is geared a little more towards boys, so best for a little boy...though, he doesn't always wanted to color in premade images...he prefers to draw and make up what things are.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love this book
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the purchase, my 17 months old and I are having fun coloring this book.. nice pictures and big in size.
customer_reviews.author: Himansu Sekhar Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Fun that never ends...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect activity book for my four-year-old grandchild. Keeps her busy hours on end. Perfect packaging and arrived on schedule. And I highly recommend the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Bee007

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: THis was a gift for my 5 yr old grandson and he loved it. He likes to color and the big pictures made it that much easier for him to stay within the lines.
customer_reviews.author: Gal-on-the-run

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: One large picture for page, cute and nicely drawn images perfect for kids to color, and also for applique designs for those who sew. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Highgate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coloring book for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2.5 year old, who does not typically like coloring books at all, but he loves this one! It’s perfect for his little hands and working on fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Avm11

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: Love this book so much! The pages are thick and pictures are big, which is perfect for my toddlers. I've only deducted a star bc the pages arent perforated and it's very hard to rip them out.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson N.

customer_reviews.title: The Coloring book was very enjoyable !
customer_reviews.text: My Son told me that my Granddaughter was very exited when she received the book. She enjoyed the book so much that she's looking forward to the next one that i give her !
customer_reviews.author: roderick foxworth sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 year old but poor quality binding
customer_reviews.text: Our truck-obsessed son loves this coloring book! Unfortunately the binding quality is not good. The spine immediately came undone and needed to be taped extensively. Pages tend to fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Manhattan Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My nephews 3 & 5 years old love the book and their parents commented on the quality paper!
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my 2 year old needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a coloring book for my 2 year old. He loves this book! Nice quality paper, nice quality images, lots of pictures- it's great. MUCH better than another set of coloring books I bought and quickly returned (stay away from the Terrific Toddler coloring books).
customer_reviews.author: Christy Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing book
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old and she loves it, so does everyone else in the house. Great designs and easy to color. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MnW

customer_reviews.title: What a great coloring book
customer_reviews.text: What a great coloring book. My granddaughters can color for hours they love coloring and this is a great color you like to buy it for your child
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my 6 yo son for Christmas as a stocking stuffer. He really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1st coloring book
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something with simple large shapes and this coloring book has tons of them, and my 3 yr old granddaughter really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Lots of variation in coloring
customer_reviews.text: Book has lots of variations which keeps child engaged. Some pages has more than one image so overall more number of images for coloring. Good for use for crayons but avoiding water color looking into page thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep Agrawal

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite books ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 and 3 year old and these are our favorite coloring books ever!! They are simple drawings and sturdy tough paper!
customer_reviews.author: Kevica

customer_reviews.title: Thick paper, simple images, great quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this book. The pages are so really thick and great quality. The images are simple and perfect for my kids, ages 3 and 4.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old loved this as her first coloring book! There is a good variety of pictures and it has lots of pages which is perfect! It’s great to gift, bring for travel, or just have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Giles

customer_reviews.title: A great coloring book for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: Big pictures with big lines and just enough detail for toddlers to color easily. No offensive or weird pictures. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this coloring book for my son to take on road trips and to our older kiddos sporting events to keep him busy and it sure has! The pictures are bigger and there are a lot of pages for him to do!
customer_reviews.author: ProudArmyWife

customer_reviews.title: Worth a buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the correct book for toddlers because the pictures are right size to color and good quality with lots of pages. Worth a buy
customer_reviews.author: Chitramanalan

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring book
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this book so much I’ve actually ordered this twice. My daughter is in first grade and enjoys it as much as my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: I love how big the pictures are.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the description. My son loves this coloring book. I totally recommend us for the kids and the adults to LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Great first coloring book for little ones! Gender Neutral, too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my (then) 13 month old's Easter basket. This was her fist coloring book. It's great! The pictures are big and varied, making it a wonderful choice for any boy or girl just learning how to color. I was also able to easily cut out some of the pages to display my daughter's artwork :)
customer_reviews.author: JAMick34

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite books for children cannit day enough about this book the pictures and paper quality is amazinggggg this is my second purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dells

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 5 year old grandkids loved receiving these coloring books for Christmas. As you can see in the photo they began using them right away! The pictures are nice and large, making it easy for young children to complete and the jumbo size of the books are sure to provide creative fun for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: kybertin

customer_reviews.title: The best toddler coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: We own a few of these and the paper is heavy weight, with bold dark lines. My 4 year old has been coloring in this for close to a year, and my 6 year old niece loves it as well. Highly recommend! My only improvement would be perforated edges to rip out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to work on my fine motor skills. It's great! I wife says I'm starting to get really good coloring in the lines. She just says that I have to color things correctly. I working on it and I'm sure I'll have the book completed correctly soon!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best coloring books for toddlers I've seen
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best coloring books for toddlers I've seen. It is HUGE with pictures on the front and back of the pages, thick paper, and I love that all thr pictures are different. Great for building/practicing vocabulary as well as coloring. This will keep us busy for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice pictures to color, but book is not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Cute coloring book, but hard to manage Would recommend tearing the pages out or the book will not stay open.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves coloring books so we got her this one for her third birthday, its PERFECT for little ones because of the thicker lines, it makes coloring in the lines easier for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby Powell
